title: Small Business Owners Can Now Enjoy Mileage Tracking App from MileageWise
text:
—
MileageWise has implemented a new element to its mileage app tracking mileage for taxes, to benefit both new and existing customers, in order to reduce the time they spend creating their mileage logbook.
To the delight of many, individuals who own and operate their own businesses, often with a small number of employees looking for mobile app for tracking mileage can now take advantage of the new offering from MileageWise as it the release is now officially announced.
This update delivers irs-compliant mileage log to customers, interested parties and those active within the small business owners and gig workers arena. MileageWise has been able to do this by implementing the new IRS guidelines even when creating retrospective logs for the milage log to be compliant no matter which year they create mileage logs for.
MileageWise is excited to unveil the latest benefit for current and new mileage app customers as it's specifically designed to improve the experience and better fulfill the needs of small business owners.
When asked to provide greater insight on the subject, Gary Csizmadia, Head of Sales at MileageWise said: "When it comes to the IRS-proof mileage log feature of MileageWise, the thing I’m most excited to share is how it offers complete peace of mind for anyone who needs to track their business mileage.
You don’t have to worry about missing trips or inaccuracies, which can be stressful when you’re preparing for taxes or facing an audit. The IRS requires mileage logs to be detailed and accurate, and any gaps or discrepancies can lead to fines or denied deductions.
MileageWise uses AI to check and correct up to 70 logical conflicts, ensuring your log is bulletproof. What’s really cool about this feature is the retrospective log creation. If you missed logging trips, the AI Wizard steps in, using patterns from your past driving history and data sources like Google Timeline to reconstruct those trips.
This not only saves time but also boosts the accuracy of your log. So even if you’ve forgotten to track a few drives, you don’t have to worry. Another thing I want people to know is how versatile this tool is.
Whether you're a small business owner, a gig worker, or someone managing a team of drivers, MileageWise tailors the experience to suit your needs. This isn’t just for freelancers—it’s a powerful tool for any business that depends on accurate mileage logs for tax deductions and reimbursements."
MileageWise has made a point of listening to its customers and taking feedback wherever possible. They reportedly do this because by addressing customer pain points, MileageWise develops solutions that directly tackle issues like missed trips, IRS compliance, and seamless expense tracking..
MileageWise has made it part of its mission to By offering AI-powered trip tracking, gap filling, and automated reporting, they aim to save users significant time and effort in managing mileage logs. in the small business owners and gig workers market.
The business is known as MileageWise is currently perceived as a strong, reliable solution in the mileage tracking market, particularly praised for its IRS-proof mileage logs, automated tracking, and the unique AI Wizard feature. This AI technology stands out by allowing users to retroactively create and complete mileage logs, filling gaps and ensuring compliance.
It’s especially valued by small business owners, self-employed individuals, gig workers, and employers managing teams who need accurate mileage records for tax deductions and reimbursements. amongst fans and customers, which Gary Csizmadia is immensely proud of, with the business being operational now for 4 years.
Interested parties who would like to be among the first to experience the mobile app for tracking mileage with MileageWise are encouraged to visit the website at https://www.mileagewise.com/ for full details and to get started.
